nodes.text: Bounty Hunters 11 is the eleventh issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Bounty Hunters. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Paolo Villanelli and Arif Prianto, and first published by Marvel Comics on April 14, 2021. It features the story "The Great Hunt of Malastare," which follows bounty hunter Bossk on a solo mission.

THE GREAT HUNT OF MALASTARE! BOSSK awakens to find himself as the hunted instead of the hunter on the forest planet of MALASTARE. But who is the mysterious figure behind the hunting party stalking the infamous TRANDOSHAN? A special solo adventure starring the most savage bounty hunter of all!
